post.name: Junior Research Fellow (JRF)
post.project_title: Long term trend in weather parameters and atmospheric chemistry and its effects on tea cultivation over North-East India
essential_qualification: M.Sc / M.Tech, preferably with graduation in Physics or Mathematics
responsibilities: Perform tasks assigned by the PI of the project
Collect data from different parts of North-East India

interview.place: Department of Mathematics, NIT Agartala, Tripura
interview.instructions: Candidates should bring filled application, photograph, signed scan copies of educational qualifications, research publications, and original certificates for verification.

terms_conditions: Position purely temporary, governed by Research & Consultancy Cell, NIT Agartala
Candidates must ensure eligibility before appearing for interview
No TA/DA for attending the interview or joining
Appointment temporary as per institute terms and conditions
Candidate responsible for authenticity of information, documents, and photographs
Selected candidate may register for PhD at NIT Agartala if eligible
Temporary engagement can be terminated without assigning any reason

application_form_fields: Educational Qualification (Higher School onwards) with board, year, subjects, percentage
content.undertaking: Candidate declares all information furnished is true, correct, and complete to the best of their knowledge and belief.
